Title: Dripsy Forgot Her Candle
Description:
Gather round, tenderfoots, and Granny Scribbles tell you story.

Story of what happen when Dripsy forgot her candle.

Dripsy little tenderfoot, like you, who wander away from tribe...
CompletionText: You listen too. Maybe learn something.
RewardText: Important not forget candle. Something every little kobold need learn.
